desc: Experience Ayurveda like never before with authentic Ayurvedic products from Chingoli Ayurveda Family ,which is dedicated to the practice of holistic health and wellbeing since 1908. It is run by a family of Kerala Ayurveda physicians with a repository of rich wisdom in Ayurveda accumulated over four generations.

layout.text: Nirava unlocks ancient Ayurvedic beauty secrets for you. Say hello to strong, shiny and beautiful hair.
